item.title: 10m from traffic lights a deep hole on nearside., 21st February
item.description:
I’m near side as travelling towards town centre and approaching traffic lights with Christchurch Road. Triangular hole approximately 10 m prior to traffic lights which is quite deep.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 54, Lansdown Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Volunteer litter pick bags ready for collection, 21st February
item.description:
Volunteer litter pick bags ready for collection. Two bags, one containing general litter and the other cans/plastic bottles for recycling. Next to the Innsworth Lane Sports Ground sign. The 'What 3 Words' location is ///examiner.slopes.courage The ordnance survey map reference is: 51.883919,-2.213313 Council Litter Bin Ref: 0254

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Innsworth Lane, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous potholes on Horsefair Street between junction of Lyefield Road West and St Mary’s Church., 21st February
item.description:
Horsefair Street between Lyefield Road West and the intersection by St Mary’s Church is littered with numerous potholes. This stretch of road was not re-surfaced when surrounding roads were a couple of years ago. The closure of A40 has caused huge increase in traffic on this road and is in dire need of repair. Now that the A40 is back open, there is an opportunity to sort this out. The residents along here have put up with months of inconvenience due to increased traffic and now have a deteriorated road surface that is a danger to cars and people.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24, Horsefair Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
